column1: The Purple Pig////Was in town for work and tracked down this place to try it out as others have told me how great it is.  I ordered the chorizo stuffed olives (too much vinegar and chorizo flavors did not have much presence) and chicken thigh kebabs (perfect
column2: would order again).  This place is smaller then most restaurants which creates a very tight-nit feel almost like you are at a family reunion and everyone is crammed into a small space but don't ever really notice it because everyone is having such a great time.  I sat a communal table with some other offend folks and enjoyed my conversations with them.
